errors.updateCategoryGamesFailed: Failed to update category games, please try again

LaunchModal.pathRequired: Please select or enter a path

dbBackupPath.note: Set the save path for database backup files. Leave empty to use the default path (AppData/data/backups), or the program directory in portable mode
dbBackupPath.pathPlaceholder: Leave empty to use default path
dbBackupPath.title: Database Backup Path

lePath.note: Set the executable file path for LE region switching software, used for region switching when launching games
lePath.title: LE Region Software Path

magpiePath.note: Set the executable file path for Magpie software, used for game screen magnification
magpiePath.title: Magpie Software Path

savePath.note: Set the root directory path for game save backups. Leave empty to use the default path
savePath.pathPlaceholder: Leave empty to use default path
savePath.title: Game Save Backup Path

Snackbar.failedOpenGameFolder: Failed to open the game folder

Toolbar.lePathNotSet: LE region switching software path not set, please configure the path first
Toolbar.magpiePathNotSet: Magpie software path not set, please configure the path first

closeDialog.message: Please choose an action: Exit or Minimize to tray?
closeDialog.title: Close Application

Collection.deleteCategoryMessage: Are you sure you want to delete category "{{name}}"? This will remove the association between this category and all games, but will not delete the games themselves.
Collection.deleteGroupMessage: Are you sure you want to delete group "{{name}}"? This will also delete all categories in the group and cannot be undone.

errors.deleteGroupFailed: Failed to delete group, please try again

DataSourceUpdate.bgmOrVndbIdRequired: Bangumi ID or VNDB ID cannot be empty
DataSourceUpdate.customModeWarning: Custom mode cannot update from data source.
DataSourceUpdate.noDataFetched: No data fetched or data source invalid.

GameInfoEdit.developerHelperText: The game's developer or production group name
GameInfoEdit.noteHelperText: You can set a custom display name for the game, leave blank to use the default name
GameInfoEdit.previewSelected: New image selected, will take effect after saving
GameInfoEdit.summaryHelperText: A short description of the game or story outline

batchUpdate.description: The batch update feature can be used to update BGM/VNDB data for existing games. When game metadata changes, you can use this feature to sync the latest information. Once you click the update button, please wait patiently as the update process may take some time. It is recommended to use when updating game data sources.
batchUpdate.error: Failed to batch update VNDB data: {{message}}
batchUpdate.errorBgm: Failed to batch update BGM data: {{message}}
batchUpdate.noBgmGames: No games with BGM ID found
batchUpdate.noBgmToken: Update failed: BGM Token is not set
batchUpdate.noGames: No games with VNDB ID found
batchUpdate.title: Batch Update Data

cardClickMode.doubleClickLaunchNote: Enabling this will cause a 200ms delay for left-click (navigation mode only)
cardClickMode.longPressLaunchNote: Launch game after long-pressing card for 800ms. Enabling this will disable collection drag-sort feature
cardClickMode.navigate: Navigation Mode (Single click to view details)
cardClickMode.select: Selection Mode (Single click to select game)
cardClickMode.title: Card Click Mode

databaseBackup.importSuccess: Database imported successfully, application will restart automatically
databaseBackup.pathNote: Leave empty to use the default path (AppData/data/backups), or the program directory in portable mode
databaseBackup.restoreWarning: Restoring database will overwrite existing data, please use with caution. The application will restart automatically after import.
databaseBackup.title: Database Backup & Restore

dev.title: Experimental Features
dev.tooltip: The following features are experimental, please use with caution

logLevel.description: Only effective for the current session, not saved. Used to temporarily adjust the backend log output verbosity.
logLevel.title: Log Settings

pathSettings.note: Configure paths for game save backups, LE region software, Magpie software, database backups, etc.
pathSettings.title: Path Settings

portableMode.confirmDisableMessage: After disabling portable mode, the database and backups will be migrated to the system application data directory. The application will restart automatically after successful operation.
portableMode.confirmEnableMessage: After enabling portable mode, the database and backups will be migrated to the program installation directory. The application will restart automatically after successful operation.
portableMode.description: When portable mode is enabled, the database and backups will be saved in the program installation directory's resources folder, instead of the system application data directory. Suitable for scenarios where you need to use the program on a USB drive or external hard drive.
portableMode.title: Portable Mode

spoilerLevel.description: Select spoiler level to get appropriate tag content
spoilerLevel.title: TAG Spoiler Level

tagTranslation.description: Enable Chinese translation for game tags
tagTranslation.title: TAG Translation

timeTrackingMode.description: Select how game time is calculated, affecting time display and statistics recording.
timeTrackingMode.elapsedDesc: Counts total time from game launch to exit, regardless of focus
timeTrackingMode.playtimeDesc: Only counts time when the game window is in focus, pauses when switching to other windows
timeTrackingMode.title: Game Time Tracking Mode

batchUpdate.noBgmGames: No games with BGM ID found
batchUpdate.noVndbGames: No games with VNDB ID found
